section_description:
Pre requisites: A/B test (shift_coverage_transfer / enabled):
 https://admin.example.com/abtesting/experiment/26/change/

1. Pro should have an upcoming gig.

2. Should click on “I can’t make it” link on gig details screen and navigate to the “Choose an option” screen.

 3. Taps on “Get my shift covered” row and that brings pro to the “Get shift covered” screen.

Test video: https://drive.example.com/shared/fgghfhgfhj
section_full_path: My Shifts > Upcoming Shifts > Shift Transfer
title: Send transfer request to professional with Name and Phone number

custom_steps_separated.content: On the “Get shift covered” screen, pro enters the name of the professional to whom he wants to send shift transfer request
Click “Send request” button on empty form.
custom_steps_separated.expected: User should get error messages: 1. “Please enter a name.” and “Please enter a phone number.”
user gets an error msg “Please enter a name with at least 2 characters."
no error message should show up

custom_steps_separated.content: Enter an invalid US phone number.
custom_steps_separated.expected: User should get an error message “Please enter a valid phone number.”

custom_steps_separated.content: Enter a phone number that is not associated with an Instawork account
custom_steps_separated.expected: The error message "Please try someone else. This Pro does not have an account with Instawork yet." should appear

custom_steps_separated.content: Enter a phone number of a pro who does not meet the requirements for the shift.
custom_steps_separated.expected: The error message "This person isn't eligible to cover this shift." should appear

custom_steps_separated.content: Enter the phone number for the account that you are testing on and try to click on "Send request".
custom_steps_separated.expected: User should get an error message "Please enter the phone number of the person who can cover your shift."

custom_steps_separated.content: Enter a valid US phone number that is associated with a pro account and has the appropriate prerequisites for the shift. Click “Send request” button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Pro should get green confirmation “We’ve received your request” banner.

custom_steps_separated.content: Click on the "I can't make it" button on the gig details page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Verify: There is text at the top of the screen stating how many shift transfers you have in progress with a link to see the status of each request
